title: Windows Subsystem for Android update adds H.264 hardware decoding
content:
Microsoft has released an update for the Windows Subsystem for Android to Windows Insiders in all channels of the program. This update comes with some significant improvements that should make some apps that much more useful. Among them is support for hardware-accelerated H.264 video decoding in the Windows Subsystem for Android, meaning Android apps can

The post Windows Subsystem for Android update adds H.264 hardware decoding appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has updated the Windows Subsystem for Android with hardware decoding for H.264 video along with other improvements.
